alert.note: Alert for Cascade; Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Eastern Glacier; Eastern Pondera; Eastern Teton; Jefferson; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front; Toole (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 25 at 3:16PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, southwest, and west central Montana, including the following areas, in central Montana, Cascade and Meagher. In north central Montana, Eastern Glacier, Eastern Pondera, Eastern Teton, Northern Rocky Mountain Front, Southern Rocky Mountain Front and Toole. In southwest Montana, Broadwater and Jefferson. In west central Montana, Central and Southern Lewis and Clark. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Additionally, rockslides are possible in steep terrain due to the expected heavy rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Cascade; Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Eastern Glacier; Eastern Pondera; Eastern Teton; Jefferson; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front; Toole
